definition: to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: They take themselves seriously the appearance of other in part, with be concerned about face-saving about.
sentences.chinese: 他們重視自己另一半的相貌，與愛面子有關。

sentences.english: W2: No, Chinese worry about losing face a lot more than people in my country.
sentences.chinese: 不，中國人比我們國家的人更愛面子。

sentences.english: Aries are very big concerns, is also very concerned about their views on others.
sentences.chinese: 牡羊座的人非常愛面子，也很在意別人對他們的看法。

sentences.english: His parents' obsession with keeping up appearances haunted his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 父母過於愛面子的做法在他兒時一直困擾着他。

sentences.english: You can't drop the whole thing just to keep up appearances.
sentences.chinese: 不能爲了愛面子就不辦這件事情了。

sentences.english: Factitious what whatever thing is concerned about face-saving ?
sentences.chinese: 人爲什麼無論什麼事都愛面子呢？

sentences.english: Love face, do not compromise, is a regret in life.
sentences.chinese: 愛面子，不妥協，是人生一個缺憾。

sentences.english: I thought you were too proud take alimony .
sentences.chinese: 我以爲你愛面子不愛贍養費呢。

sentences.english: He purposely made those remarks in order to save face.
sentences.chinese: 他因愛面子而故意說那些話。

sentences.english: She said she cared a lot about face.

definition: to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted
hard to deal with/hard to get along with
to make trouble without reason (idiom); to be deliberately provocative
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
to show off/to try to be brave
